name: ext_R5_ResearchStudy
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ResearchStudy for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchStudy from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Investigation to increase healthcare-related patient-independent knowledge
element.definition: A scientific study of nature that sometimes includes processes involved in health and disease. For example, clinical trials are research studies that involve people. These studies may be related to new ways to screen, prevent, diagnose, and treat disease. They may also study certain outcomes and certain groups of people by looking at data collected in the past or future.

element.definition: Describes an expected event or sequence of events for one of the subjects of a study. E.g. for a living subject: exposure to drug A, wash-out, exposure to drug B, wash-out, follow-up. element.short: Investigation to increase healthcare-related patient-independent knowledge
element.definition: A scientific study of nature that sometimes includes processes involved in health and disease. For example, clinical trials are research studies that involve people. These studies may be related to new ways to screen, prevent, diagnose, and treat disease. They may also study certain outcomes and certain groups of people by looking at data collected in the past or future.
